text: @NYGovCuomo Its not denial. The trump admin is INTENTIONALLY undermining and ignoring the response to COVID19. THEY ARE ENDING FEDERAL TESTING PROGRAMS. Its criminal malfeasance that's so severe it's causing an American genocide.
